dmca.title: Fraud site - www.barclaysalliance.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Brandon Abbey [mailto:babbey@escrow.com] 
Sent: Monday, May 02, 2005 12:53 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: ifcc33@ic3.gov; la.ectf.reports@usss.dhs.gov
Subject: Fraud site - www.barclaysalliance.com
Importance: High



It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.barclaysalliance.com

 

This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services provider, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES").  It has been brought to our attention that your company
provides services to a website, www.barclaysalliance.com which is infringing
on Escrow.com's intellectual property rights to the material posted on
Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/> ).  This site claims to
be associated with our companies and has stolen content from Escrow.com.
Please disable this site immediately.

 

Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.barclaysalliance.com site, http://barclaysalliance.com/help.php. Neither
Escrow.com nor IES has any affiliation with www.barclaysalliance.com  and
has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of
is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.  

 

The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.  

 

 
Brandon W. Abbey
Managing Director
Escrow.com
16275 Laguna Canyon Road
Irvine, CA  92618
Direct - 949-790-5880
Fax - 949-790-5811
